name.br: Pergaminho de Amplificação de Grupo (15 dias)
name.jp: パーティーポイント増幅の巻物（15日）
name.sp: Pergamino de Amplificación de Party (15 días)
name.th: Scroll of Party Amplification (15 วัน)
name.tw: 劇團點數無限制卷軸(15天)

description.en: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 15 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.ar: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 15 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.br: Seu grupo irá receber o dobro de pontos quando elevar de nível. Duração de 15 dias. Note que o contador deste pergaminho continuará regressivo mesmo se você estiver desconectado.
description.cns: 当你的剧团升级后，你的剧团将获得两倍的剧团技能天。持续 15 天。 请注意，即使退出，此物品持续时间还会被计算。
description.de: Deine Party erhält doppelt so viele Partypunkte, wenn sie ein neues Level erreicht. Hält 15 Tage. Die Zeit läuft auch dann weiter, wenn der Charakter offline ist.
description.fi: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 15 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.fil: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 15 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.fr: Pendant la durée du parchemin, les points de groupe obtenus à chaque niveau seront doublés. La durée de ce parchemin décroîtra même si vous êtes déconnecté. Dure 15 jours.
description.id: Party Anda akan mendapatkan dua kali lipat jumlah poin saat mencapai level baru. Berlangsung selama 15 hari. Perhatikan bahwa penghitung pada item ini akan terus menghitung mundur bahkan saat keluar.
description.it: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 15 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.jp: パーティーのレベルアップ時の獲得ポイントが2倍になります。15日間有効です。（ログアウトしてもカウント）
description.kr: 극단이 새로운 레벨에 도달했을 때 두 배의 점수를 받습니다. 15일 간 지속되며, 로그아웃한 경우에도 카운트다운은 계속됩니다.
description.nl: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 15 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.pl: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 15 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.ru: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 15 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.sp: Tu Party ganará el doble de puntos cuando alcance un nuevo nivel. Dura 15 días. Ten en cuenta que el contador del objeto seguirá bajando aunque estés desconectado.
description.sw: Your party will get twice the number of points when reaching a new level. Lasts 15 days. Note that the counter on this item will continue to count down even when logged out.
description.th: ปาร์ตี้ของคุณจะได้รับคะแนนเป็นสองเท่าเมื่อไปถึงเลเวลใหม่ ใช้เวลา 15 วัน โปรดทราบว่าเวลาในไอเทมนี้จะยังคงนับถอยหลังแม้ว่าจะออกจากระบบแล้ว
description.tw: 劇團升級所獲得點數兩倍，持續15天，即使登出也會持續計算。
description.vi: Nhóm của bạn sẽ nhận được gấp đôi số điểm khi lên cấp độ mới. Kéo dài 15 ngày. Lưu ý rằng bộ đếm trên mặt hàng này sẽ tiếp tục đếm ngược ngay cả khi đã đăng xuất.
